detaileddescription.para:
Usage:
ngram_comparator(NULL, &order); - to set order of ngrams qsort(ngrams, count, sizeof(lm_ngram_t), &ngram_comparator); - to sort ngrams in increasing order

memberdef.argsstring: (lineiter_t **li, hash_table_t *wid, logmath_t *lmath, int order, int order_max, ngram_raw_t *raw_ngram)
memberdef.name: read_ngram_instance

memberdef.argsstring: (ngram_raw_t **raw_ngrams, lineiter_t **li, hash_table_t *wid, logmath_t *lmath, uint32 count, int order, int order_max)
memberdef.name: ngrams_raw_read_order

briefdescription.para: Read ngrams of order > 1 from ARPA file.

parameterdescription.para: [in] sphinxbase file line iterator that point to bigram description in ARPA file
[in] hashtable that maps string word representation to id
[in] log math used for log convertions
[in] amount of ngrams for each order

simplesect.para: raw ngrams of order bigger than 1

memberdef.argsstring: (FILE *fp, logmath_t *lmath, uint8 do_swap, int32 counts, ngram_raw_t *raw_ngrams, int weight_idx)
memberdef.name: read_dmp_weight_array

memberdef.argsstring: (FILE *fp, logmath_t *lmath, uint32 *counts, int order, uint32 *unigram_next, uint8 do_swap)
memberdef.name: ngrams_raw_read_dmp

briefdescription.para: Reads ngrams of order > 1 from DMP file.

parameterdescription.para: [in] file to read from. Position in file corresponds to start of bigram description
[in] log math used for log convertions
[in] amount of ngrams for each order
[in] array of next word pointers for unigrams. Needed to define forst word of bigrams
[in] wether to do swap of bits

simplesect.para: raw ngrams of order bigger than 1
